name: FNiagaraPlatformSetCVarCondition
doc: Imposes a condition that a CVar must contain a set value or range of values for a platform set to be enabled.

CVarName: The name of the CVar we're testing the value of.
PassResponse: If this CVar condition passes, how should this affect the state of the Platform Set?
FailResponse: If this CVar condition fails, how should this affect the state of the Platform Set?
Value: The value this CVar must contain for this platform set to be enabled.
MinInt: If the value of the CVar is less than this minimum then the PlatformSet will not be enabled.
MaxInt: If the value of the CVar is greater than this maximum then the PlatformSet will not be enabled.
MinFloat: If the value of the CVar is less than this minimum then the PlatformSet will not be enabled.
MaxFloat: If the value of the CVar is greater than this maximum then the PlatformSet will not be enabled.
bUseMinInt: True if we should apply the minimum restriction for int CVars.
bUseMaxInt: True if we should apply the maximum restriction for int CVars.
bUseMinFloat: True if we should apply the minimum restriction for float CVars.
bUseMaxFloat: True if we should apply the maximum restriction for float CVars.
